definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Theory of water-blend heavy oil and combustion mechanism were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 对重油掺水乳化的实质及乳化油燃烧过程进行了探讨。

sentences.english: Oh sure, it's been watered down over the years.
sentences.chinese: 当然，这些年来它已经被掺水了。

sentences.english: Two glasses of whisky and water, please.
sentences.chinese: 请给我两杯掺水威士忌。

sentences.english: They caught the bartender stretching the gin with water.
sentences.chinese: 那个酒吧招待在杜松子酒内掺水时被他们抓到了。

sentences.english: Some Germans have taken to drinking cider vinegar neat.
sentences.chinese: 有些德国人喜欢饮用不掺水的苹果醋。

definition: to blend various types of wine (or spirits, or fruit juices etc)
to mix in fake material/to adulterate
to pour water into/to inject water into
to dilute/to debase (by mixing with fake material)
to feed in/to load (raw material, supplies, fuel etc)/to supply/fortified (with added material)
to emit bubbles/to bubble/to foam (with rage)/to seethe
